meanings.sent1: She carefully incut her initials into the tree trunk.

meanings.definition: A cut or engraving made in something
meanings.sent1: The ancient artifact displayed an intricate incut on its surface.
meanings.sent2: She admired the delicate incut on the jewelry piece.
meanings.sent3: The incut on the tree trunk seemed to tell a mysterious story.
meanings.sent4: The map had an incut marking the hidden treasure location.
meanings.sent5: The intricate incut on the stone tablet revealed ancient symbols.
